document_data.name: Toyo Otomoto
document_data.mainbody: '''Toyo Otomoto''' was a sea captain in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Otomoto was a very experienced captain in service of [[Shou]] [[Ko clan]] for a long time commanding the "[[Joyful Spring]]" ship. He made numerous travels between Kozakura and far [[Akari]] island, where [[Shou Lung]] was constructing a colony. In 1357 Otomoto transported an adventuring party hired by [[Ko Mei Kho]] to stop the [[Ochimo]].
